price: (Onyankopͻn) no a Ɔsane nsuo firi soro sεdeε εsε, na Yεde nyane asaase a awuo; saa ara na mo nso mobɛpue (afrii adakamena mu).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
